attributes.action: Oppose Mayor Joe Anderson's bid for City Region Mayor
attributes.additional_details:
Mayor of Liverpool Joe Anderson is seeking further powers as 'Metro Mayor' of Merseyside under plans for English devolution.
Mayor Anderson has caused great unrest in Liverpool by refusing to listen to his city constituents regarding public issues, and has continued to sell off our parks and green spaces to developers, spends money from the public purse without being held to account and is currently marking 11 libraries for closure.
We the undersigned do not believe that Mayor Anderson should be given any further power.
